p: Similarly, EC-I exhibited a lethal effect on the growth of both P. aeruginosa and E. coli after 8 h of incubation. The plot of both samples measured at the 2-MIC stage was approximately identical to that at 1-MIC. EC-I exhibited a rapid killing effect on P. aeruginosa development, with a lethal effect after 4 h of incubation and after 8 h on E. coli. The effects of EC-I on P. aeruginosa and E. coli growth were destroyed after 8 h of incubation.
